attributes.action: Make the Seven Bridges free to people living in wales
attributes.additional_details:
Every month my husband spends £100 + on bridge fees to get home from work.
What I would like to see is an introduction of TAG based badges for households that live in Wales but work/travel regularly in England.
We contribute to both the Welsh and English economies so why cant we get help in this matter?
There are more than enough people crossing the bridges every day to make up for the loss of revenue on households receiving free crossings. Its something that is raised on a regular basis on social networking so perhaps its time the government acted upon it.
Make it feasible for people to continue to work and travel in England, but live in and contribute to Wales.
